rukus.text: Kazhu, "ya obozhnyuyu tilʹky moho Lorda; YA nikoly ne vstanovlyuyu budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya Yoho
Kazhu, "ya ne volodiyu potuzhnistyu zavdaty shkody vam, ne shchob keruvaty vamy
Kazhu, "Niyakyy kozhnyy ne mozhe zakhystyty meni z BOHA, ne mozhe ya znakhodzhu budʹ-yakyy inshyy prytulok bilya Yoho
ya dostavlyayu BOZHI vidozvy ta povidomlennya." Tsey khto ne pidkoryayutʹsya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru zaznayutʹ vohnyu Pekla, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
Odnoho razu vony dyvlyatʹsya shcho ochikuye yikh, vony znaydutʹ khto ye diysno bilʹsh slabyy u potuzhnosti, ta menshe u chysli
Kazhu, "ya ne znayu yakshcho shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vy vidbudetesʹ skoro, abo yakshcho miy Lord zatrymaye tse dlya deyakoho chasu
Vin yavlyaye soboyu Knower maybutnʹoho; Vin ne vidkryvaye maybutnye do budʹ khto
Tilʹky do kur'yera shcho Vin vybyraye, Vin vidkryvayutʹ z mynuloho ta maybutnʹoho, spetsyfichnoyi novyny
Tse musytʹ perekonatysya shcho vony dostavyly yikhni povidomlennya Lorda. Vin znaye tsilkom yaki vony. Vin rozrakhuvav nomery vsikh rechey
